Replies.Reply: Eager to mend its tarnished image, Los Angeles has really put out the welcome mat for tomorrow's summit.
Tensions remain high since last year's skirmishes between North Korea and the U.S. So any chance of the communist North joining the Pacific Partners seems highly unlikely.
I can't stand it -- half an hour to get to the stupid school every morning... with no music...
But only one with a smoking section.
The glass is an inch thick.
Armor-plated. Bulletproof. Bomb-
pivots his head and looks at the tiny microphone, no bigger than a pencil eraser, attached neatly to the headrest.
High-tech problem, low-tech solution.
You a bomb expert?
Causing, 50 yards ahead of the Mercedes and van, the most hellacious, gut-wrenching, piss-your-pants, chain-reaction PILE-UP you can imagine.
Carson grabs the metal lid from a garbage can at the curb and FLINGS it like a huge Frisbee. It sails across the street --
The other drivers in the intersection see this and go completely nuts. Some duck for cover under their dashboards.
The Negotiator stands and takes the faxes from Carson.
When everyone thinks they've seen it all, here comes another mad biker -- Carson -- riding against traffic in pursuit.
Dave comes into the room.

Sam tilts his head forward and bends his wrist upward so he can get the rest of the gum out of his mouth. Then, while keeping pressure on the armrest with his elbow, he moves his hand over to Mrs. Han. They can't quite reach each other...
Carson glances over at the telephone on Colonel Lee's desk.
Bobbi, her Pilot and her Cameraman turn when they hear a KNOCKING on the windshield of their copter...
They're hovering above the roof of a high-rise hotel downtown.
Dumbfounded everybody looks at each other...
The FIRE is spreading across the carpet and walls. Carson is hurrying everyone out onto the small balcony. He helps Lisa into the rescue harness. She's terrified.
Dust and debris from the explosion hang in the air; helicopters crisscross the scene.
Son of a bitch!
Yeah, right.
Shit!
Asshole was trying to boost my car!
Mike -- call 911!
I hate this fuckin' town.
If I hear one more Beach Boys song, I'll shoot myself.
I said, if we were having sex once in a while, you wouldn't need to ride that fucking bike every morning.
Shop's gonna tow the car in --
You ask me, those suckers are a lost cause.
You mean it's not for you.
I'd die of shock, from finding anyone dumb enough to buy the place.
That sure cheers me right up.
One cut... two assholes in the hospital... Yep.
Well, another day of baby-sitting my favorite bunch of people...
They're not gonna transfer me. You know damn well why I was bumped down to guard duty...
My outstanding people skills.
I hate this fuckin' town.
Give me a secure radio!
You bet -- nice and easy.
Robbins, Sabatini... Chopper's on its way.
Check it out! Ahead, on the right!
Yeah... but it seems too easy... I'll move up; he won't suspect a civilian car. Stay back, then get on his ass when I signal. We'll box him in.
If the Mod Squad gets in your way, don't be shy about getting 'em out.
He's gonna wrap it around something!
Oh, shit...
I'm in no mood...
Let's get back to the Consulate.
His Security Chief.
There was a civilian with them --
I'm not so sure what happened here.
Start a trace!
Yeah, you didn't know. And I'm Meryl Streep.
Say you want to talk to the kids...
Ask Dave if he knows how to find the phone's serial number.
Oh, Jesus, those're explosives!
Look at the TV -- this was just taken.
-- Goddamn Negotiator's the last thing we need! This asshole sound like he was interested in bargaining?
...You're gonna just pay up, count on his good nature to return the family?!
-- They know their phones are tapped!
This Consulate is my responsibility.
...Our worst enemy'll be the city.
You see one word of Peoples'-
-- Already doing it. We're coordinating with the Secret Service, the NSA and the CIA.
If she'd changed her name when we got married, I wouldn't have to.
My ass.
-- Hey, do I go to the torture chambers in your prisons, tell you how to do your job?
I'll coordinate the drop.
It sucks.
-- I expect him to expect it. He'll check the cash with an RF detector...
Meaning he'll find this one.
This only has a quarter-mile range, but on a frequency too low to detect.
And I doubt the asshole will have an X-ray machine or a metal detector.
Gosh, you're right. It could undermine their self-esteem and spoil their chances for rehabilitation.
Just tell me if we can use it.
Nothing but physical surveillance.
Well, it ain't gonna happen.
Shit... no way we can set up a stake-
Four minutes. Call the Park Rangers at the Bowl. Have them clear the area of civilians.
Must've bought a house same time we did.
There's about a hundred ways he can scurry off like a cockroach from here... So spread out.
Fuck! Okay, stay back. It's not like he'll be hard to see in that truck.
We're made! Gotta grab him!
Watch it! We need him alive!
FBI. Call our office, they'll take care of you.
Just don't kill yourself, you piece of shit...
Helicopter or two would be nice!
Not just now, dear...
I coulda had a ranch... maybe some horses... but no, we moved to L.A.
He's on foot, at the base of the elevator tower!
Goddammit! He's in a blue Geo!
Fingerprint it.
He's not gonna tell us where to find the hostages...
Meaning we got exactly 80 minutes to figure it out for ourselves.
Miranda! We need a copter, pronto!
Get back to his van. There were no plates, but check the VIN, look it over, then meet us at the Consulate.
Go!
...Scrounge us some bodies: National Guard, State Troopers, CHPs, local PD's, meter maids --
Look, I don't need you to tell me how fucked we are!
Let's take stock. We've got a picture of where he hid the family, and recordings of his calls --

Same with his fingerprints. But that means we need high-quality image and data transmission. We can piss away ten minutes coptering this shit to our offices in Westwood, or we can use your surveillance equipment.
-- You want to play games, fine.
South Korean Consulate's just down the street -- want to take a listen?
Shitcan that thing, will you?!
Got a digital scanner?
You might want to drop a few bucks at Radio Shack and get with the decade.
Dave -- get in here. Bring your computer, a city map, and the tapes of the ransom calls.

This is Carson in L.A. There's a set of prints coming over. Narrow the search criteria: Male, thirties, Caucasian... French, Belgian, Swiss, maybe Canadian. Try kidnappers and bombers first. We need an answer in fifteen minutes.
Dazzle me.
We got one of the best sound guys right here in town...
Newman in Audio Analysis...
Get those tapes transferred to a sound guy. We need ambient and background analysis, the whole enchilada.
No... 'cause you're fat.
Jesus H. Christ...
Do it.
Any significance?
Get the Bureau on it.
Look, goddammit, you start skipping no-chance-in-hell leads, we can all quit and go to the beach right now.

-- Bet he doubled back.
Cute.
He signed the name of the Allied Commander during the Korean War.

I'm going to the kidnapping site.
Great, we'll hire a bus.

Twelve-gauge shell filled with magnesium and ignition powder. Shit's worse than napalm -- Geneva Convention outlawed it for warfare.
Easy -- you can buy 'em mail order.

Shut up!
Find it! How many bulletproof Mercedes could be cruising around Crenshaw?
I hate this fuckin' town.
Wasted trip: Witnesses say he was working alone, and he was a vicious son of a bitch. Old news.

Looks like the wheel of a car.

Say what?

Carson...

Okay -- high-rises in our search area. Eight stories or higher.
Sabatini! What about that billboard?
LAPD will have a record of all emergency vehicles running Code 3 at 9:32 AM. Get their starting point and their destination.

Get his Driver's License number; Social; bank accounts; charge cards; club memberships... find out what movies he rented.  Get whoever's closest to the Auto Shop to get in there, interview everybody.

-- Quit apologizing for me!
Sounds like her aim's a little low.
Apartment 1060! He's in a high-rise!

K-EYE. Clear it with 'em. Have a SWAT team assemble, but tell 'em to hang back unless we need 'em.

We can't get into that right now...
This works out, I'll play the fuckin' banjo for you.
We're hoofing it.

Wait here.
I'm in. It's empty, but sit tight while I look around.
NO! --
I said keep everyone back!!
Get out of my sight.
What's the status?
Hurry it the hell up.
I should've known she'd come up.
-- "Should've." Shit, there's a familiar word.

Same age as the Han boy...

Wait... go back... the one at seven this morning...
Get down!
MIRANDA!
Get the fuck out of here!
Shit, it's like a Godzilla movie out here!
Miranda..!
I want you to get out of here...

Negative -- his car's armored! And we need the bastard alive!!
One of yours?
What the hell do you need heat-

No shit...

Get me out of here...
Anybody see him?

Just keep working your leads...
This is Carson. I need a copter.

I'll make him open the sunroof.

Wrong-o...
Pull hard to the left, on my signal...
Now!

Dave...
Anything else come through?

...Have the Manager evacuate the complex. Find out which unit the family's in, but don't let anyone go in 'til we get there.

DON'T!
We have to go out the window.
Too risky. Let's concentrate on getting you out of here.
Sound detectors?
Pressure sensors. Use 'em in convertibles: Bad guy sits on your seat, he sets the alarm off. These are rigged backwards -- get up, you set 'em off.
Nope. But I've had some car alarms in my day.
For all the goddamn good they do...
Slide your arm forward... Watch the meter... Keep the pressure on the armrest with your elbow...
It'll squeeze the sensor, duplicate the weight of your arm... Okay...
Low-tech solution...
Lean back... Carefully.
Nag, nag, nag...
You'll be over in five seconds...
sends Sam across... the harness comes back... he straps Mrs.

is engulfed in the FIREBALL... We can't tell if he's alive.

The Bureau.

It's my outstanding people skills.

pulls the pillows over her head and sighs.
Not again...
I was watching that.
Be right with you...
Have you gotten any sleep lately?

It's not for you.
I don't chase car thieves in my underwear. C'mon, you'd die of boredom if we ever sold this house and moved.
Lots of people bought at the top of the market...
I don't know why we even talk about it. The city's not the problem. So we move. It wouldn't matter. What's that saying: "Wherever you go, there you are."
I hope you're current on your tetanus booster. Was it worth it?
Ask for a transfer.
I'm wondering whether to believe him when he says he's strictly motivated by money.
I still want to check the MO against known politicals, terrorists --
Have someone talk to the LAPD, give them a cover story for the media about the crash on La Cienega.
I'm so enjoying this opportunity to finally work together...

Everything indicates he's working alone. And his concerns do seem to be solely about the money... so I agree that he's only using the Summit and the tension with North Korea to create extreme motivation to pay the ransom.
But it means we can get on with it.
Get one thing straight, Mr. Walther.
He'll expect a homing device --
Why must you always refer generically to criminals as "assholes?"

He's really exhibiting pressured speech... big effort here to sound calm. Same with his vocabulary... if he were in control, he wouldn't feel such a need to sound that way.
If we needle him he could get sloppy and give us an opening, but I'm not going to risk it. This is the worst kind of perpetrator: anything makes him deviate from his carefully-
Do we have back-up if the bleeper fails?
It's real important we don't lose him. He didn't go through all the trouble of designing that bomb not to use it.
Yes, please go ahead...
-- I'm only here to see that everyone gets what they want --
The drop is at the DeMille barn, across from the Hollywood Bowl.

What happened?
All right... Carefully...
Love to be in the loop on this...

Well, the normal procedure is to negotiate with the perpetrator...
-- That's right! We can send them to our experts for analysis...
Colonel, you saw the perp. Describe him to the Ambassador, see if it's anyone he knows.
Photo enhancement... Isn't there some amazing tech with the LAPD --
Given his behavior, this orange residue... I'd say Desoxyn, 25 mg.
It's consistent with the lone wolf scenario: A handful of these is pure bravery-in-a-bottle, 'til the psychosis and paranoia kick in.
We could check pharmacy records, on the remote chance he got them legally... if we had a couple of weeks, that is.
Forget it. It's a waste of manpower.
That gives him about fifty minutes to get to his location, move and secure the hostages, and activate his time bomb.
The most densely-populated part of the L.A. basin. This narrows it down to about 200,000 dwellings.
He was traveling west --
C'mon, that's total conjecture --
You're telling me?

done it without half that stuff. But this was going to be the score of a lifetime... he was showing off.
I want to talk to the witnesses.
Then how did he get it?
He means all of us "you people."
We talked about these billboards, when we were car shopping! Four-

Stop it!

There is a cable running from Javal's computer to his cell phone. He hooks another cable to the digital camera, and an IMAGE appears on the screen of his laptop. He clicks on "SEND."
From the series of jerking, slipping MOVEMENTS, it is clear the copter is not going to stay where it is for long.

one of the checks as it scrolls off the screen.

Someone took my family!
My men are going!
It's a white telephone van, driving west on Washington Boulevard.
Mr. Walther?
-- I have no wish for condolences.
Yoon..?!
I need to know my children are all right.
There is a television in my office.

This is impossible! How can you even begin to find them?
Take them upstairs.
I felt safer when I was the Ambassador to Libya.
On occasion, my wife has been known to kick my ankle under the table.

There are men in my government whose power depends on North Korea staying as it is: Socialist, repressive, isolated from the world. They'll resort to anything, even war, to keep it that way. They have the Hitler Syndrome: if their country cannot exist the way they want it, they would rather see it destroyed.
There could be another riot...
I don't think so -- they said it was solid as a rock.
I can't believe I'm still alive...
What are both of you doing?
Let him up.
Mrs. Han... I am very sick today...
We will see you next week...
Very good. You may go now...
You see that I'm serious in my intention, yes?
If you cooperate, you and your children will be home for dinner tonight.
grins... it's show-time. He STOMPS on the gas.
I need to concentrate!
Does anyone need to use the rest room? This will be your last opportunity for a few hours.
Very well. Mrs. Han, Sam, Joy, please sit here.
No, Mrs. Han, this one. Thank you.
You afford me some additional bargaining power. But not much.
There. No taping your mouths, no restraints. Please remain still while I explain. The meters on the left indicate sound pressure --
Kaboom...
Easy... deep breath...
Do each of you understand?
Keep your wits, and all will be fine.
I want you to remember the feeling you had when you thought your family was dead, and use it to inform the choices you're about to make.
Be in front of a television in two minutes. Tune it to channel four.
There must surely be several people in the room; you may put me on the speakerbox if you wish.
I am not a terrorist. Your countries' political posturing means nothing to me. So do not waste time trying to negotiate.
That's more like it...
"And my device will fulfill its function at exactly 5:00 PM..."
Ah... this must be one of those professionals --
-- I've got my shotgun in little Lisa's mouth, and I will pull the trigger in five seconds unless you put the Ambassador on the phone.
continues down the freeway on his bike, straddling lanes, driving the wrong way, retracing his route back to Highland, leaving CAR HORNS, CURSING, and COLLISIONS in his wake.
speeds up. A car passing on the right BUMPS him. Javal grabs for the handlebar to stabilize himself, DROPPING the shotgun.
reacts to another SLIP. The big saddlebags of money on the seat start to slide toward the open door.

Go back over the hill.
-- "Stalled vehicle! One lane closed!

Where are you going?

Marchfelder.

What the hell is the big crisis?
Bullshit. They're just ticked because we don't want the Chinese dragging their asses into the treaty talks.
Respond?! Christ. What about the damn Premier?

I don't want to deal with this right now! Get our diplomats on it. Tell the North we'll pay the ransom for 'em... Placate 'em! And make damn sure we get that family back in one piece. Who's in charge in L.A.?
-- Whatever. I want a total news blackout and I want this over with, quickly! Without giving those Commie little bastards any excuse to shit all over my Summit!
Meaning?
Are they out of their fuckin' minds?!
-- A goddamn WHAT??
I don't believe I'm hearing this!
So if we know it's coming, we can knock it out of the fuckin' sky!
-- You're saying we got all this lousy hardware and can't stop one goddamn missile??
I want an immediate search for all ships within range.
There's no reason to panic yet --
Shit! I really don't need this today!
I'd like to turn 'em into a radioactive parking lot.
Believe me, the North drops one in my fuckin' city, I'm dropping ten in theirs. Get some bombers in the air.
So what the hell does "Kipchak" mean?
Get to the goddamn point, Major.
The Black Plague?! Every time I talk to you fuckin' guys it gets worse!
They use a biological weapon on American soil, they have to know we'll respond!
What the hell are we doing in L.A.?
All right. Assuming the worst...
I'm gonna toast those fuckers! Have the Summit leaders been warned?

Parker Center's making those calls.
I'm doin' field upgrades. Gives 'em a chance to hose out my cage.

Latest and greatest. Wireless network link-ups.

Military. Cop, maybe. Shit, your average high-school student if they're so inclined. My guess is our perp used off-the-shelf equipment for everything except the C-4, and that's only slightly harder to get than crack or heroin, if you know who to ask.
...I know it's privileged information, goddammit! Lemme talk to a supervisor... You are a supervisor... Lemme talk to your goddamn supervisor... I told you, I'm with the FBI...

...Peerless Auto Security. We need to know whether you've sold a large quantity of these components to any one customer, or whether you'd had any stolen recently...

He's on our hit parade. Interpol passed us his records when he entered the country.
French by birth... looks like a total scumbag.

Raised in Quebec. Moved to Europe; served some short stretches, petty shit... arrested for kidnapping, no conviction. Did four years in France for blowing bank vaults. Moved to U.S. last year. Clean since then.
Address, according to the Auto Shop.
